name: ChalkFace - Chapter 1
description:
A Poem for Maurice.

A killers mind can do many things,

It wanders, focuses, sings and thinks,

His memories stored on VHS tapes,

The killer that drew the dreaded ChalkFace...

Chapter 2 will be released in around 2 months

Note: The Game Takes a Very Long Time to Load :/

Update: The final Version of Chapter 1 has now been released.

I had a ton of technical difficulties but it finally works!

Thank you for your patience.
